name: Squirrel's Quest Home
description:
Autumn is beautiful, however winter is approaching fast! It's your job to get these squirrels back home after a hard day's work before its time to hibernate.

Take a moment to enjoy nature's beauty as you lead these squirrels on their way home. This 3D interactive puzzle game will keep you engaged and test your sense of direction.

Features include:

=Finding your way through fun mazes

= Trying to get through thin elevated paths without falling off!

= Beautiful autumn trees, mountains and a secret underground level!

= Adorable animated squirrel characters 

 This game was inspired by my university's large abundance of squirrels on campus. Here's to squirrels and their silly nature.

*This game was created on Unity*

All art assets were found on Unity’s Asset Store. Below are all the asset packages used:

  • Acorn Bringer Assets
  • Autumn-Trees
  • B&J Studio
  • BOXOPHOBIC
  • FreeLowPolyPack
  • Hand Painted Grass Texture
  • PBR Ground Materials
  • POLYGON- Renderbox
  • RainMaker
  • Stylized Nature Environment

Background Music

The background music for the game comes from Youtube’s Audio Library

The song is called:  “Butterflies In Love” by Sir Cubworth
